summary: This Skyrim Mod replaces the 512x512 battle maps with new, more detailed maps. Resolution is now 2048x2048. Alternate second map added in V2b, more closely resembling original regional-style map.
descriptionHtml:
This Skyrim Mod replaces the 512x512 battle maps ( ...textures\\dungeons\\imperial\\battlemap01.dds, battlemap01_n.dds, battlemap02.dds) with new, more detailed maps. Resolution is now 2048x2048.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

To view the new maps, go to Dragon\'s Reach. Go upstairs to the second level where the entrence to the Dragon\'s Reach Great Porch is located. Turn around, facing away from the door.

This is the War Room in Dragon\'s Reach.

You will see both of the new maps on the wall as well as on the table.

The wall map in Farengar Secret-Fire\'s alchemy and enchanting lab is changed to one of the new maps as well.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

NEW in V2.0:  Fix to normal map dds file.

NEW in V2b:  Alternate second map added more closely resembling original regional-style map.
author: The Mad Monk
